programme.title: Carmen & Lola
programme.desc: After two Roma women's lives collide in the suburbs of Madrid, they are forced to make a difficult choice between community and love. Award-winning LGBTQ+ drama, starring Rosy Rodríguez and Zaira Romero.

programme.title: Cicada
programme.desc: As they continue to recover from separate traumatic events, two young men gradually start to fall for each other. Drama, starring Matthew Fifer and Sheldon D Brown.

programme.title: Rurangi
programme.desc: After leaving a decade earlier, a transgender activist returns to the remote community of Rurangi, hoping to reconnect with his father. Drama, starring Elz Carrad and Arlo Green.

programme.title: Minyan
programme.desc: New York City during the 1980s, and a young gay Russian immigrant looks to escape the constraints of his community and find a world teeming with possibilities. Drama, starring Samuel H Levine and Ron Rifkin.

programme.title: Wildhood
programme.desc: After discovering that their mother could still be alive, two lads make a run for a better life, finding community, identity and love along the way. Drama, starring Steve Lund and Michael Greyeyes.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: May 1940. As the Nazis advance against Britain's European allies, newly elected prime minister Winston Churchill must decide whether to leave neighbouring countries to their fate, by striking a peace deal with Hitler, or fight on against terrifying odds for the greater good. Double Oscar and Bafta-winning period drama, starring Gary Oldman, Lily James and Kristin Scott Thomas.

programme.title: Rurangi
programme.desc: After leaving a decade earlier, a transgender activist returns to the remote community of Rurangi, hoping to reconnect with his father. Drama, starring Elz Carrad and Arlo Green.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: In 1976, Jamaica is dangerously divided across political lines and musician Bob Marley vows to quell the violence by performing at the Smile Jamaica Concert. Two days before the high-profile gig, gunmen break into the singer's home, shooting Bob, his wife Rita and manager Don Taylor. Everyone survives and Marley moves to London with his entourage to begin work on the LP Exodus under Island Records supremo Chris Blackwell. Biographical drama, starring Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch and James Norton.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: American fashion model-turned-war photographer Lee Miller is determined to document the truth of the Nazi regime, and in spite of the odds stacked against female correspondents, she captures some of the most important images of the Second World War. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Winslet, Andy Samberg, Alexander Skarsgard and Marion Cotillard.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: May 1940. As the Nazis advance against Britain's European allies, newly elected prime minister Winston Churchill must decide whether to leave neighbouring countries to their fate, by striking a peace deal with Hitler, or fight on against terrifying odds for the greater good. Double Oscar and Bafta-winning period drama, starring Gary Oldman, Lily James and Kristin Scott Thomas.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who won't be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Payne's comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, Da'Vine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa.(c)

programme.title: You Can Live Forever
programme.desc: After moving into a Jehovah's Witness community, lesbian teenager Jamie begins a life-changing love affair with the daughter of a prominent Witness Elder. Drama, starring Anwen O'Driscoll and June Laporte.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A teenager from Boston moves to a small conservative town, and discovers the council and a preacher have enforced a ban on loud music and dancing. He openly defies the harsh rules, revitalising the local youth and winning the heart of the reverend's daughter. Remake of the 1984 drama, with Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough and Dennis Quaid.

programme.title: Speak Like a Child
programme.desc: A couple are reunited with a man they grew up with in a children's home years earlier - but the apparently happy reunion soon dredges up dark secrets from their past, and it's not long before tensions bubble to the surface. Drama, starring Cal Macaninch, Daniel Newman, Richard Mylan and Rachel Fielding.

programme.title: Wildhood
programme.desc: After discovering that their mother could still be alive, two lads make a run for a better life, finding community, identity and love along the way. Drama, starring Steve Lund and Michael Greyeyes.

programme.title: Poison
programme.desc: Lucas and Edith reunite many years after a tragedy drove the former couple apart. Director Désirée Nosbusch's award-winning drama, starring Tim Roth and Trine Dyrholm.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. Biopic, starring Helen Mirren, Zed Josef and Liev Schreiber.

programme.title: Speak Like a Child
programme.desc: A couple are reunited with a man they grew up with in a children's home years earlier - but the apparently happy reunion soon dredges up dark secrets from their past, and it's not long before tensions bubble to the surface. Drama, starring Cal Macaninch, Daniel Newman, Richard Mylan and Rachel Fielding.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: In 1976, Jamaica is dangerously divided across political lines and musician Bob Marley vows to quell the violence by performing at the Smile Jamaica Concert. Two days before the high-profile gig, gunmen break into the singer's home, shooting Bob, his wife Rita and manager Don Taylor. Everyone survives and Marley moves to London with his entourage to begin work on the LP Exodus under Island Records supremo Chris Blackwell. Biographical drama, starring Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch and James Norton.

programme.title: Poison
programme.desc: Lucas and Edith reunite many years after a tragedy drove the former couple apart. Director Désirée Nosbusch's award-winning drama, starring Tim Roth and Trine Dyrholm.

Fact-based drama, starring Kate Winslet, Andy Samberg, Alexander Skarsgard and Marion Cotillard.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German army, and face a tense wait for evacuation, during a fierce battle in northern France during the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's wartime drama, which he wrote, directed and produced, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy, Mark Rylance and Fionn Whitehead.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A teenager from Boston moves to a small conservative town, and discovers the council and a preacher have enforced a ban on loud music and dancing. He openly defies the harsh rules, revitalising the local youth and winning the heart of the reverend's daughter. Remake of the 1984 drama, with Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough and Dennis Quaid.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. Biopic, starring Helen Mirren, Zed Josef and Liev Schreiber.

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. Drama, starring Michael Caine and Glenda Jackson in her final film.

programme.title: Carmen
programme.desc: In Mexico, a young woman flees to the US after her flamenco dancer mother is killed by drug cartel thugs. She crosses paths with Aidan, an ex-marine, and together they go on the run. Director Benjamin Millepied's musical reimagining of Georges Bizet's opera, starring Melissa Barrera and Paul Mescal.

programme.title: L'immensità
programme.desc: In 1970s Rome, a mother contends with her loveless and abusive marriage while caring for her children, one of who is experiencing gender dysphoria and wishes to identify as a boy. Family drama, starring Penélope Cruz, Vincenzo Amato and Luana Giuliani. In Italian.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A high-flying photographer arranges a photoshoot in a Greenwich bookshop, where his head is turned by one of the employees. He persuades the shy bookworm to model for him in Paris, and romance blossoms between them as he endeavours to transform her into a fashion icon. Musical, starring Fred Astaire, Audrey Hepburn, Kay Thompson, Michel Auclair and Robert Flemyng, with songs by George and Ira Gershwin.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Teenager Celie suffers horribly at the hands of her abusive father Alfonso until she is married off against her will to local farmer Mister, who expects her to take care of his three children. Celie's spirited sister Nettie refuses to submit to Mister and leaves Georgia, but promises to write every day. Years pass and Celie has been worn down to quiet subservience, until Mister's mistress, sultry jazz singer Shug Avery, sashays into town and lights a fire in the broken wife. Musical drama based on Alice Walker's 1982 novel, starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P Henson, Colman Domingo and Danielle Brooks.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtis's romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson.(c)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German army, and face a tense wait for evacuation, during a fierce battle in northern France during the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's wartime drama, which he wrote, directed and produced, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy, Mark Rylance and Fionn Whitehead.(c)

programme.title: L'immensità
programme.desc: In 1970s Rome, a mother contends with her loveless and abusive marriage while caring for her children, one of who is experiencing gender dysphoria and wishes to identify as a boy. Family drama, starring Penélope Cruz, Vincenzo Amato and Luana Giuliani. In Italian.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Teenager Celie suffers horribly at the hands of her abusive father Alfonso until she is married off against her will to local farmer Mister, who expects her to take care of his three children. Celie's spirited sister Nettie refuses to submit to Mister and leaves Georgia, but promises to write every day. Years pass and Celie has been worn down to quiet subservience, until Mister's mistress, sultry jazz singer Shug Avery, sashays into town and lights a fire in the broken wife. Musical drama based on Alice Walker's 1982 novel, starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P Henson, Colman Domingo and Danielle Brooks.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Rachel Marron, a famous singer and actress is subjected to death threats by an obsessive fan and persuaded to hire a former secret service agent as her bodyguard. However, neither she or her new minder realise the effect they are about to have on each other's lives. Romantic thriller directed by Mick Jackson, starring Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp and Bill Cobbs.

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. Drama, starring Michael Caine and Glenda Jackson in her final film.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A faded film star from the silent-movie era is fixated with making a comeback. When she meets a struggling screenwriter on the run from debt collectors, she persuades him to write a script that will mark her spectacular return to the screen. However, he takes advantage of the deluded actress, becoming her lover in a relationship where their mutual deceit ends in tragedy. Drama, with Gloria Swanson, William Holden and Eric von Stroheim.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A high-flying photographer arranges a photoshoot in a Greenwich bookshop, where his head is turned by one of the employees. He persuades the shy bookworm to model for him in Paris, and romance blossoms between them as he endeavours to transform her into a fashion icon. Musical, starring Fred Astaire, Audrey Hepburn, Kay Thompson, Michel Auclair and Robert Flemyng, with songs by George and Ira Gershwin.

programme.title: Drift
programme.desc: A young woman escapes her war-torn country to a Greek island, growing close with a tour guide as the pair find hope in each other. Director Anthony Chen's drama, starring Cynthia Erivo and Alia Shawkat.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: A teenager strives to be a good daughter, a good friend and a good student - all while navigating an endless barrage of invasive, obsessive thoughts that she cannot control. When she reconnects with her childhood crush, she is confronted with fundamental questions about her potential for love, happiness, friendship and hope - all while trying to solve a mystery surrounding a fugitive billionaire. Romantic drama, starring Isabela Merced, Cree and Judy Reyes.(n)

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Rachel Marron, a famous singer and actress is subjected to death threats by an obsessive fan and persuaded to hire a former secret service agent as her bodyguard. However, neither she or her new minder realise the effect they are about to have on each other's lives. Romantic thriller directed by Mick Jackson, starring Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp and Bill Cobbs.(n)

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A faded film star from the silent-movie era is fixated with making a comeback. When she meets a struggling screenwriter on the run from debt collectors, she persuades him to write a script that will mark her spectacular return to the screen. However, he takes advantage of the deluded actress, becoming her lover in a relationship where their mutual deceit ends in tragedy. Drama, with Gloria Swanson, William Holden and Eric von Stroheim.(n)

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Two female jailbirds imprisoned for murder pull out all the stops to seize the attention of the media. Aided by a slick lawyer, both women are desperate to find fame and fortune and escape the death penalty by winning public sympathy. Musical, starring Renee Zellweger, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Richard Gere, John C Reilly and Queen Latifah.(n)

programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: A teenager strives to be a good daughter, a good friend and a good student - all while navigating an endless barrage of invasive, obsessive thoughts that she cannot control. When she reconnects with her childhood crush, she is confronted with fundamental questions about her potential for love, happiness, friendship and hope - all while trying to solve a mystery surrounding a fugitive billionaire. Romantic drama, starring Isabela Merced, Cree and Judy Reyes.(n)

programme.title: Manodrome
programme.desc: Concerned about his girlfriend's pregnancy, Ralphie's life spirals when he meets a mysterious family. Writer/director John Trengove's thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Adrien Brody and Odessa Young.(n)

programme.title: Aporia
programme.desc: Since losing her husband, Sophie has juggled grief, a full-time job, and parenting her devastated daughter. However, when a former physicist reveals a covert time-bending machine, the widow is faced with a difficult choice. Writer/director Jared Moshe's sci-fi drama, starring Judy Greer and Edi Gathegi.(n)

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.(n)

programme.title: Gator Creek
programme.desc: A woman and her friends survive a plane crash, but discover something more dangerous lurking in the shallows of the Louisiana everglades. Horror thriller, starring Athena Strates and Madalena Aragão.(n)

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Young Angelo dreams of becoming an explorer and a zoologist. When he goes to visit his granny, his parents leave him behind at a rest stop, and he decides to cut through the forest in search of them. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Kristen McGuire.(n)

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Sam, a fearless young girl raised outside of her Maori culture, is determined to connect with a mountain in the hope it can cure her cancer. Along the way she meets new friends Mallory and Bronco. Co-writer/director Rachel House's comedy, starring Elizabeth Atkinson, Reuben Francis, Terence Daniel and Byron Coll.(n)

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nester's mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption. Writer/director Jed Hart's thriller, starring Lyndsey Marshal and Declan Adamson.(n)

programme.title: September 5
programme.desc: During the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, a US sports broadcasting team must adapt to live coverage of the Israeli athletes being held hostage by a terrorist group. Fact-based thriller, starring Peter Sarsgaard, John Magaro and Ben Chaplin.(n)

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A father returns to Australia to buy his childhood home. To celebrate, he takes his teenage son to Luna Bay so they can surf together. However, he becomes locked in a battle of one-upmanship with local thugs. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Julian McMahon.(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: Helm Hammerhand sits on the throne of Rohan, flanked by sons Hama and Haleth and rebellious daughter Hera. Dunlending lord Freca proposes a marital union between Hera and his son Wulf, which Helm loudly rejects. In a subsequent brawl between fathers, Helm unintentionally lands a fatal blow, so Wulf vows revenge and amasses an army led by General Targg. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Gaia Wise, Brian Cox, Luke Pasqualino and Lorraine Ashbourne.(n)

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: The blue hedgehog, Knuckles and Tails reunite to face the might of the villainous Shadow, who possesses powers unlike anything they have seen before. Outmuscled on every front, Sonic seeks help from an unlikely source, Dr Ivo Robotnik. Fantasy adventure sequel based on the videogame, starring Jim Carrey, James Marsden and Tika Sumpter.(n)

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nester's mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption. Writer/director Jed Hart's thriller, starring Lyndsey Marshal and Declan Adamson.(n)

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: An ex-prosecutor investigates when a man falsely pleads guilty to drug trafficking after being framed, uncovering a corrupt lawyer's scheme and fighting to restore justice - despite obstruction from evil forces. Action thriller, starring Donnie Yen, Julian Cheung and Francis Ng. In Cantonese.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Detectives look into a couple's complicated past when a man finds his wife stabbed to death in their home.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A man's children stand by him as he deals with courts in upstate New York.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A doctor ingests a lethal chemical, causing friends to wonder if it was an attempt at suicide or if he was poisoned -- until a love triangle is uncovered.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Four years after a 28-year-old dies after hosting a New Year's Eve party, a jury must decide if it was suicide or murder.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The mystery of a Florida hotel owner's disappearance confounds family, friends and the detectives investigating the case.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Authorities investigate multiple suspects when a vibrant young woman disappears on her son's fifth birthday.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The investigation into a newlywed's disappearance focuses on her job as a CIA employee as a possible clue.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a woman's remains are found miles from her home, investigators start digging into her past.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Campus cops make a terrible discovery in a dorm room after a boyfriend's weekend visit goes horribly wrong.(n)

programme.title: Sunday Today With Willie Geist

programme.desc: Interviews with public figures and those making news, setting the political agenda and spotlighting the impact Washington decision-making has on Americans.(n)

programme.desc: A matriarch's death leads to a prominent family from Texas being torn apart by decades of betrayal, greed and mistrust.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A woman's disappearance tears her young children apart; a sting operation catches an unlikely villain.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: As Hurricane Charley ravages a small town in Florida, a man trying to avoid his past hides out in a hotel room.(n)

programme.desc: Liam Neeson stars as Oskar Schindler, who tries to save Jewish workers from the Nazis. Violence/strong language/mature themes/flashing images.

programme.desc: A man is thrown into the brutality of prison life when he gets two life sentences for a crime he claims he didn't commit. Drama starring Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: Frodo (Elijah Wood) and Sam march toward Mount Doom to destroy the ring, while Gandalf (Ian McKellen) and warriors prepare for a final confrontation with Sauron and his allies.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helm's daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Armed with nothing but a hatful of dreams, young chocolatier Willy Wonka manages to change the world, one delectable bite at a time.

programme.title: The Big Year
programme.desc: Three men (Steve Martin, Jack Black, Owen Wilson) race around North America in a prestigious contest to see who can spot the greatest number of bird species in a single year.

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: After his former colleague is murdered, a masked vigilante (Jackie Earle Haley) uncovers a plot to discredit and destroy the world's superheroes.

programme.title: Freaky Tales
programme.desc: An NBA star, a corrupt cop, a female rap duo, teenage punks, neo-Nazis and a debt collector embark on a collision course in 1987 Oakland, Calif.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

programme.title: The Fate of the Furious
programme.desc: Members of the globe-trotting crew face an unexpected challenge when a mysterious woman named Cipher forces Dom to betray them all. Now, they must unite to bring home the man who made them a family and stop her from unleashing chaos.

programme.title: Hard Knocks: Training Camp With the Buffalo Bills
programme.desc: Head coach Sean McDermott and general manager Brandon Beane are featured alongside the 2024 NFL Most Valuable Player, quarterback Josh Allen, and an array of veteran and rookie players training at St. John Fisher University in Pittsford, New York.

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.

programme.desc: Head coach Sean McDermott and general manager Brandon Beane are featured alongside the 2024 NFL Most Valuable Player, quarterback Josh Allen, and an array of veteran and rookie players training at St. John Fisher University in Pittsford, New York.

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: Perseus, the son of Zeus, is caught in a war between gods and is helpless to save his family from Hades. With nothing left to lose, Perseus leads a dangerous quest to prevent Hades from overthrowing the king of the gods and laying waste to Earth.

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: Costner's epic vision of the American frontier as seen through the eyes of a 19th-century U.S. Cavalry officer.

programme.title: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
programme.desc: In the 28th century, two special operatives (Dane DeHaan, Cara Delevingne) race against time to save the diverse city of Alpha from a dark force that also jeopardizes the future of the universe.

programme.title: Hard Knocks: Training Camp With the Buffalo Bills
programme.desc: Head coach Sean McDermott and general manager Brandon Beane are featured alongside the 2024 NFL Most Valuable Player, quarterback Josh Allen, and an array of veteran and rookie players training at St. John Fisher University in Pittsford, New York.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: Another Earth
programme.desc: Following her release from prison, a morose young woman (Brit Marling) seeks out the man (William Mapother) whose life she shattered in a car accident several years earlier.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: The Green Lanterns have little regard for humans, who have been unable to harness the powers of the ring each member wears. But Jordan, a test pilot, may be the corps' only hope when an enemy called Parallax threatens the universal balance of power.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Accused of murder, a man (Justin Timberlake) must figure out how to bring down a system where time is money, enabling the wealthy to live forever, while the poor must beg for each minute of life.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: A thief (Leonardo DiCaprio) who enters people's dreams and steals their secrets gets a shot at redemption when he is given the dangerous task of planting an idea in someone's subconscious.

programme.desc: Sensing something ominous afoot, Claude reconnects with his brother in Tennessee, while Holly, Ralph, Yunis, and Andy follow him in hopes of isolating the evil force and thwarting its next kill; a visiting family avoids a dangerous encounter.

programme.desc: After obscuring their true purpose in town from local police, Ralph and Yunis interview witnesses from the cave festival, while Holly and Andy visit the scene; later, the group considers its next move as Claude deals with the weight of his role.

programme.desc: In the 1800s, Gen. Nanisca trains a group of all-female warriors to protect the African kingdom of Dahomey from a foreign enemy that's determined to destroy their way of life.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: A chosen hobbit (Elijah Wood) and his loyal friends join a wizard (Ian McKellen), humans, a dwarf and an elf on a quest to destroy a powerful ring and defeat an evil lord.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Now divided, members of a fellowship take different paths to destroy the ring and defeat evil Sauron and his pawns.

programme.title: Enter the Warriors Gate
programme.desc: A mysterious chest opens a gateway through time that transports teenage gamer Jack to an ancient empire. Jack will need all of his gaming skills to battle a cruel barbarian king, protect a beautiful princess and find his way back home.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after traveling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Death of a Unicorn
programme.desc: A weekend retreat has deadly consequences when a father and daughter accidentally hit and kill a unicorn while en route to find his billionaire boss, who seeks to exploit the creature's miraculous curative properties.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: On the eve of her law-school graduation, Veronica turns amateur sleuth once again after ex-boyfriend, Logan, becomes a murder suspect.

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: A pessimistic magazine article prompts an unmarried woman to revisit her numerous ex-boyfriends to find out if one of them could be her true love.

programme.title: Goodrich
programme.desc: Andy's life gets upended when his wife enters a 90-day rehab program, leaving him in charge of their twins. With his career falling by the wayside, he soon leans on his pregnant daughter for support, ultimately becoming the father she never had.

programme.title: Tyrel
programme.desc: Tyler spirals out of control when he realizes he's the only black person attending a weekend birthday party in a secluded cabin.

programme.title: The Commandant's Shadow
programme.desc: Hans JÃ¼rgen HÃ¶ss, the 87-year-old son of Rudolf HÃ¶ss, faces his father's terrible legacy as he meets Auschwitz survivor Anita Lasker-Wallfisch. Hans enjoyed a happy childhood while Anita was trying to survive the concentration camp.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helm's daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: Four years after the Battle of Gallipoli in World War I, an Australian farmer (Russell Crowe) travels to Turkey to scour the battlefield for the bodies of his three missing sons.

programme.title: Megan Leavey
programme.desc: Young Marine Cpl. Megan Leavey starts to identify with Rex, a particularly aggressive combat dog that she trains. Together, they complete more than 100 missions until an improvised explosive device injures both, putting their fates in jeopardy.
